title: When I try and unlock my phone the screen goes black and then goes back to the unlock screen
content:
I have a google pixel XL and have recently installed the latest android update. Yesterday I tried to unlock my phone and the screen went black for 1-2 seconds before returning me to the unlock screen. This happens both when trying to input my password and unlocking with my fingerprint.

I have tried restarting the phone multiple times, with no change.
I tried opening the phone in safe mode, also no change.
I turned off the phone and let it charge for a while before turning it on again, no change.

I would be reluctant to do a factory reset because I don't want to lose my notes but would be willing to do so if it fixes my phone. Unfortunately, as I can not unlock it, I can't do a factory reset so I would appreciate some advice on how to do this if my issue cannot be fixed. Thank you.
